short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display timestamped comments on the video timeline.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension brings the community's insights directly to your video timeline, making it easier than ever to navigate and engage with content.

Key Features:
1. Timeline Integration: See timestamped comments as markers on the video progress bar, allowing for quick navigation to discussed moments.
2. Description Timestamps: Automatically detects and displays timestamps mentioned in the video description.
3. Comment Preview: Hover over timeline markers to preview associated comments without scrolling through the comment section.
